name: Geometry Garden
description:
Geometry Garden Top down shooter with a twist!

Your gun keeps changing between shooting square and triangle bullets. Enemies hit with the wrong type will multiply! How long can you survive?

Created for Ludum Dare 35 - the theme was Shapeshift.
Check out the timelapse to see how I created the game.


Click here to go to the Ludum Dare entry page.


Play on web!
